title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, December 20, 2020
description: It’s the 66th birthday of Mexican-American writer Sandra Cisneros (Chicago, 1954), best known for "The House on Mango Street" (1984).
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the 66th birthday of Mexican-American writer Sandra Cisneros (Chicago, 1954), best known for "The House on Mango Street" (1984).
